Paragraph: We report syncope and bradycardia in an 11 - year - old girl following administration of intranasal dexmedetomidine for sedation for a voiding cystourethrogram .

Note: Intranasal dexmedetomidine is a medication used for sedation, it is not a disease. Voiding cystourethrogram is a diagnostic procedure and not a disease either.
